Class CollisionManager

java.lang.Object
game.managers.CollisionManager
public class CollisionManager extends Object
Manages collision detection and handling between game entities. Processes player collisions with obstacles, items, and platforms.

Responsibilities:

  • Obstacle collision detection and damage application
  • Item collection and effect application
  • Platform collision for jumping and landing
  • Entity removal after collision

  • Method Details

    • checkCollisions

      public CollisionManager.CollisionResult checkCollisions(Player player, List<Obstacle> obstacles, List<Item> items, List<Platform> platforms, AudioManager audioManager)
      Checks and handles all collisions for the current frame.
      Parameters:
      player - the player entity
      obstacles - list of active obstacles
      items - list of active items
      platforms - list of active platforms
      audioManager - audio manager for sound effects (can be null)
      Returns:
      collision results containing score changes and speed boost status

    • checkObstacleCollisions

      private void checkObstacleCollisions(Player player, List<Obstacle> obstacles, AudioManager audioManager, CollisionManager.CollisionResult result)
      Checks collisions between player and obstacles.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      obstacles - list of obstacles
      audioManager - audio manager for damage sounds
      result - collision result to update

    • checkItemCollisions

      private void checkItemCollisions(Player player, List<Item> items, AudioManager audioManager, CollisionManager.CollisionResult result)
      Checks collisions between player and collectible items.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      items - list of items
      audioManager - audio manager for collection sounds
      result - collision result to update

    • getObstacleCollisions

      public int getObstacleCollisions()
      Gets the total number of obstacle collisions.
      Returns:
      collision count

    • getItemsCollected

      public int getItemsCollected()
      Gets the total number of items collected.
      Returns:
      collection count

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets collision statistics.
